enhancements: Added language field (en/nl) to all songs
Improved lyrics formatting with proper spacing
Removed website metadata and navigation text
Detected and preserved verse/chorus structure where possible

newSchema.title: Song title
newSchema.artist: Artist name (Ilse DeLange or The Common Linnets)
newSchema.language: ISO 639-1 language code (en for English, nl for Dutch)
newSchema.lyrics: Formatted lyrics text with improved spacing
